body: Learn from the mistakes of others. You can never live long enough to make them all yourself.
If you're not having fun, you're doing something wrong.
While money can't buy happiness, it certainly lets you choose your own form of misery.
Whatever it is, I'm against it.
The only real laughter comes from despair.
Premature optimization is the root of all evil.
Overarchitecting / underplanning is the root of all evil.
I don't know what I'm doing and the customer doesn't know what they want!
Good code is its own best documentation.
A good UI makes the complex appear simple.
Controlling complexity is the essence of computer programming.
First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.

Computers are useless.  They can only give you answers.
It could be that the purpose of your life is only to serve as a warning to others.
